sentences.en: A loud disturbance had broken out, partly applause, partly a meaningless uproar.
sentences.cn: 一片起哄的声音爆发起来,响亮得很, 一半是鼓掌声, 还有一半是莫名其妙的叫嚷.

sentences.en: Enough. You prattle on like a child reciting bits of meaningless trivialities.
sentences.cn: 够了. 你就像个小孩在背诵无聊的琐事.

sentences.en: Fines are meaningless to guys earning millions.
sentences.cn: 罚款对挣大钱的人来说无关紧要。

sentences.en: Has my life really been so meaningless?
sentences.cn: “我的生存就是这样地孤寂 吗 ?”

sentences.en: He said a few meaningless words to his hostess and looked around the room.
sentences.cn: 他向女主人说了几句无关紧要的话，又环视了一下房间。

sentences.en: He would rather have a decent death which served some purpose than a meaningless death.
sentences.cn: 他宁愿死得其所，也不想无谓地死去。

sentences.en: I should like to break out of this meaningless way of life.
sentences.cn: 我倒是想摆脱这无聊的生活方式.

sentences.en: Is this love , this meaningless jealousy and selfish desire to possess?
sentences.cn: 这种无味的嫉妒,这种自私的占有,便是所谓爱 吗 ?

sentences.en: Life seemed on a sudden empty and meaningless.
sentences.cn: 生活似乎突然显得空洞而无聊.

sentences.en: She broke from the inconsequent meaningless mild tone of irony.
sentences.cn: 她中断了她无关痛痒,无足轻重的温和的嘲讽语调.

sentences.en: Such a muddle - headed life is meaningless. Stop it right now !
sentences.cn: 这样浑噩的日子,还有什么好过的,不如早点结束 吧.
作者是谁是无关紧要的.

sentences.en: The Bible stories seemed slow and meaningless when compared to the bloody thunder of pulp narrative.
sentences.cn: 圣经故事同杂志上刊载的流血恫吓相比显得呆板单调.

sentences.en: There a way through, Carson thought, or else this duel is meaningless.
sentences.cn: 一定存在通过那道结界的办法, 卡森心念, 否则这场决斗将失去意义.

sentences.en: Too many sound effects can render your movie ineffective or meaningless.
sentences.cn: 太多的声音会使你的影片显得低俗无义.

sentences.en: Widespread political and economic disarray threatens to make the constitution meaningless.
sentences.cn: 四处蔓延的政治和经济混乱可能会使宪法变得可有可无。

words.tran_cn: 有意义地；意味深长地；有意图地

trans.tran_cn: 无意义的，无价值的，“meaning”的派生，无谓
trans.tran_en: having no purpose or importance and therefore not worth doing or having
